Nightlight:

"You will laught"said softly the femme"But you reminds me some=
one, but I... I dont know who; also, when i was awaking I felt in danger, b=
ut obviously I was wrong."she did a weak smile"I guess that I confused all;=
 "

Perceptor just came back with some food, Nightlight tried to sat down a=
nd after a big attempt she did with Perceptor's help; Perceptor offered a n=
utricious energon soup whose Nighlight slowly eats; when she finished it, P=
erceptor spoke

"Try to sleep a little, young one"said kindly the blind pre=
dacon"You need it"

Nightlight smiled again at Rodimus and nodded Perceptor=
. With his help, Nightlight lay down and slowly fell sleep.

"Come"said Per=
ceptor in low voice"We have to let her rest"

From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: =
Monday, March 15, 2010 4:45 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Rec=
overing Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
> Nightlight smiled at Rodimus, by a str=
ange reason he reminds her to somoeone but she couldnt put her finger on wh=
o. She relaxed and answered "I feel weak"
>
> "You will feel better with ti=
me"said Perceptor "with some rest and some food you certanly you will... Ro=
dimus, I go to get some food for her, stay with her. She is in a good healt=
h condition, but I prefer dont leave her alone.  "
>
> Perceptor left the R=
oom and started to  get some food for Nightlight, the things had happned ac=
oording with the plan

Rodimus pulled a chair over near to where Nightlight=
 lay as he looked
at her. He was not sure what to say to her, as his own me=
mories of her
were not the best. It was like he could remember bits and pie=
ces, but
it was like he was watching a movie or hearing someone else talk, =
the
memories did not feel like they were his.

"What do you remember?" he s=
aid, curious if every bit was wiped, or
were there fragments remaining like=
 he had.

(TAG)

Preston
